metadata.name: Invoke-Obfuscation Obfuscated IEX Invocation - PowerShell
metadata.comment: Detects all variations of obfuscated powershell IEX invocation code generated by Invoke-Obfuscation framework from the following code block \u2014

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM script_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND script.script_content.value rlike '\\$PSHome\\\[\\s*\\d\{1,3\}\\s*\\\]\\s*\\\+\\s*\\$PSHome\\\[' AND script.script_content.value rlike '\\$ShellId\\\[\\s*\\d\{1,3\}\\s*\\\]\\s*\\\+\\s*\\$ShellId\\\[' AND script.script_content.value rlike '\\$env:Public\\\[\\s*\\d\{1,3\}\\s*\\\]\\s*\\\+\\s*\\$env:Public\\\[' AND script.script_content.value rlike '\\$env:ComSpec\\\[\(\\s*\\d\{1,3\}\\s*,\)\{2\}' AND script.script_content.value rlike '\\*mdr\\*\\W\\s*\\\)\\.Name' AND script.script_content.value rlike '\\$VerbosePreference\\.ToString\\\(')

output.summary: Detects all variations of obfuscated powershell IEX invocation code generated by Invoke-Obfuscation framework from the following code block \u2014
